Class ThreadContext

extends java.lang.Object
    Thread-local context, used internally by this library.

      • getThread

        public IGreenThr getThread()
        Get current thread. If current is null (not running inside a IGreenThr instance), a new GreenThread will be created using current IGreenThrFactory.
        Returns:
        current

        Parameters:
        thr - current thread
        Returns:
        this
